sentences.en: Baxter arrived here this afternoon, on a surprise visit.
sentences.cn: 巴克瑟特今天下午突然来此拜访.

sentences.en: Bob tried the door. To his surprise it opened.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃试着推了推门。令他吃惊的是，门竟然开了。

sentences.en: Chantal would have considered it ill-mannered to show surprise.
sentences.cn: 钱特尔会认为表现出吃惊是失态的。

sentences.en: His strange question surprised her.
sentences.cn: 他那奇怪的问题令她感到意外。

sentences.en: I didn’t know you two knew each other. Mind you, it doesn’t surprise me .
sentences.cn: 我不知道你们俩认识。 尽管如此，我并不感到意外。

sentences.en: I had to bite back a yelp of surprise.
sentences.cn: 我只好强忍住，没惊叫出来。

sentences.en: It wouldn’t surprise me if he married Jo.
sentences.cn: 要是他和乔结婚，我不会吃惊的。

sentences.en: Major's reply came as a complete surprise to the House of Commons.
sentences.cn: 梅杰的回答让众议院大吃一惊。

sentences.en: She looked as if the photographer had caught her by surprise.
sentences.cn: 看上去，她好像被摄影师搞了个猝不及防。

sentences.en: Sue screamed, not loudly, more in surprise than terror.
sentences.cn: 休尖叫起来，声音不大，吃惊多于恐惧。

sentences.en: The Foreign Office in London has expressed surprise at these allegations.
sentences.cn: 位于伦敦的英国外交部对这些说法表示惊讶.

sentences.en: The man had a look of surprise on his face.
sentences.cn: 那人脸上一副惊讶的表情。

sentences.en: The old man turned to give her a look of pure surprise.
sentences.cn: 老人转身十分惊奇地看了她一眼。

sentences.en: The rebels attempted a surprise raid on a military camp.
sentences.cn: 叛军试图突袭一处军营。

sentences.en: The surprise gift is a thankyou for our help.
sentences.cn: 这份意外的礼物是为了感谢我们给予的帮助。

sentences.en: The surprise twists in the storyline are the film's greatest strength.
sentences.cn: 该影片最精彩之处就是剧情的曲折离奇。

sentences.en: The vividness of the characterisation came as a complete surprise.
sentences.cn: 人物刻画的生动程度完全出乎意料。

sentences.en: We'll solve the case ourselves and surprise everyone.
sentences.cn: 我们将自己解决这件事，并让所有人吃惊。

sentences.en: What surprised me most was that she didn’t seem to care.
sentences.cn: 最令我感到意外的是，她好像毫不在乎。

sentences.en: When you venture outside, you are in for a surprise.
sentences.cn: 你外出探险时，定会遇上意想不到之事。

sentences.en: Whenever it snows in Britain we are taken by surprise.
sentences.cn: 每次英国下雪，我们都会感到惊讶。

words.tran_cn: 感到惊讶的，出人意料的
使惊奇（surprise的过去分词形式）
使惊奇；意外发现（surprise的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 使吃惊，使诧异，使感到意外
(非正式)（在给予别人惊奇时说的）真惊奇，真惊奇
出其不意地攻击（或俘获）

trans.tran_cn: 意想不到（或突然）的事，令人惊奇的事，惊奇，诧异
trans.tran_en: the feeling you have when something unexpected or unusual happens

trans.tran_cn: 使惊奇/诧异/感到意外，使措手不及，给…惊喜
